name: Windows unmarshal post exploitation
author: Nicolas Joly
Matthias Kaiser
Sanjay Gondaliya
Pratik Shah <pratik@notsosecure.com>
description:
This module exploits a local privilege escalation bug which exists
        in microsoft COM for windows when it fails to properly handle serialized objects.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.

options.name: COMMAND
options.description: The command to execute as SYSTEM (Can only be a cmd.exe builtin or Windows binary, (net user /add %RAND% %RAND% & net localgroup administrators /add <user>).

options.name: EXPLOIT_NAME
options.description: The filename to use for the exploit binary (%RAND% by default).

options.name: SCRIPT_NAME
options.description: The filename to use for the COM script file (%RAND% by default).

options.name: PATH
options.description: Path to write binaries (%TEMP% by default).
